itemLabel: Norman Macfarlane, Baron Macfarlane of Bearsden

wikipedia_page.main: Norman Somerville Macfarlane, Baron Macfarlane of Bearsden,  (5 March 1926 – 5 November 2021) was a Scottish industrialist and member of the House of Lords who sat as a Conservative.

link_mentions.page: List of Knights and Ladies of the Thistle
